card_text: Add 1 "Great Sand Sea - Gold Golgonda" from your Deck to your hand. If "Great Sand Sea - Gold Golgonda" is in your Field Zone, you can apply this effect instead.$N‚óèAdd 1 "Springans" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, send 1 "Springans" monster from your Deck to the GY.$NYou can only activate 1 "Springans Watch" per turn.
